name: SlowCounter
0:
”Alexa open slow counter.”
”Alexa launch slow counter.”
”Alexa, ask slow counter for 100.”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: slow counter
des:
You can use slow counter to have Alexa slowly count up to a certain number.

After you launch the skill, Alexa will ask you to provide your number. Alexa will slowly count up to your number.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
